# Banjo Paterson Writing Award

The Banjo Paterson Writing Award is an Australian literary award honouring the legacy of Australian writer Andrew Barton Paterson (1864-1941) and is awarded annually in the categories of prose, poetry and childrenâ€™s writing.  The Banjo Paterson Writing Award is separate from the now-defunct National Book Council Banjo Award.
